name: BillsFan

”Alexa, open Bills fan.”
”Alexa, ask Bills fan for a flash briefing on the Bills.”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bills fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Bills by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Bills.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Bills Fan how are the Bills doing? 

Alexa, ask Bills Fan who do the Bills play next?

Alexa, ask Bills Fan LeSean McCoy (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Bills:


Alexa, ask Bills Fan to tell me some trivia about the Bills. 

Alexa, ask Bills Fan how many Super Bowls have the Bills won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
